metadata.name: Golden Token: City 7 1/999
metadata.description:
**[CryptoCitizens](https://opensea.io/collection/cryptocitizensofficial) | [Roadmap](https://www.brightmoments.io/) | [Discord](https://discord.gg/brightmoments)**

A Golden Token City 7 (GTC7) NFT provides the holder with a claim to mint 1 of 1,000 City 7 CryptoCitizen NFTs through an IRL-only mint experience. City 7 will be in Southeast Asia (i.e Seoul, Singapore, or Bangkok) in Spring 2023 and voted on by CryptoCitizen holders in Fall 2022.
